title: Ultra-conservative José Antonio Kast elected Chile’s next president | Chile | The Guardian
snippet: Under Kast’s leadership, “we are confident Chile will advance shared priorities to include strengthening public security, ending illegal immigration, and revitalising our commercial relationship,” Rubio said in a statement.

title: Conservative José Kast wins Chile presidency with 58% on security platform | Fox News
snippet: José Antonio Kast wins Chile's presidency with 58% of the vote on a hard-right platform promising mass deportations, expanded policing and military deployment against crime.

title: Kast’s Victory in Chile Is Another Win for Global Right-Wing Movement - The New York Times
snippet: Kast was elected as Chile’s president on his third try, scoring a resounding victory against his leftist opponent and pushing the country decidedly to the right as Chileans sought iron-fisted solutions to increased violence and illegal immigration.

title: REACTION: What José Antonio Kast's Victory Means for Chile
snippet: With a call to demonstrate civility ... open-market economic model, Kast also drew a clear contrast with the more protectionist approach of other radical-right governments....

title: Chile elects Kast as president in sharp rightward shift | Reuters
snippet: SANTIAGO, Dec 14 (Reuters) - Jose ... on Sunday, leveraging voter fears over rising crime and migration to steer the country in its sharpest rightward shift since the end of the military dictatorship in 1990....
